titles.title: Break Thou the Bread of Life

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Break thou the bread of Life,
Dear Lord, to me,
As Thou didst break the bread
Beside the sea;

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Beyond the sacred page
I seek Thee, Lord;
My spirit longs for Thee,
Thou Living Word.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Thou art the Bread of Life,
O Lord, to me,
Thy holy Word the truth
That saveth me;

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give me to eat and live
With Thee above;
Teach me to love Thy truth,
For Thou art love.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
O send Thy Spirit, Lord,
Now unto me,
That He may touch my eyes
And make me see;

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Show me the truth concealed
Within Thy Word,
And in Thy Book revealed,
I see Thee, Lord.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Bless Thou the Bread of Life
To me, to me,
As Thou didst bless the loaves
By Galilee;

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Then shall all bondage cease,
All fetters fall,
And I shall find my peace,
My all in all.
